event_name: VI CIDIA - VI Congresso Internacional de Direito e Inteligência Artificial

location.address: SKEMA Business School - Belo Horizonte Campus
location.online_platform: Hybrid format with online working groups

description: The VI International Congress on Law and Artificial Intelligence (VI CIDIA) is a premier academic event promoted by SKEMA Business School in collaboration with CONPEDI (National Council for Research and Graduate Studies in Law). This 6th edition focuses on the intersection of artificial intelligence and law, addressing crucial topics including AI regulation, ethics, legal frameworks, and the impact of emerging technologies on the legal profession. The event is particularly relevant in the context of Brazil's ongoing AI regulation efforts, including the recently approved PL 2338/23.
organizers: CONPEDI (Conselho Nacional de Pesquisa e Pós-graduação em Direito)

speakers.description: Renowned national and international specialists in AI and law
Leading Brazilian legal scholars and practitioners
AI researchers and technology industry leaders
Specialists in AI regulation and policy development

requirements: Academic paper submission for working groups
Extended abstracts due by July 31, 2025 11:59 PM

working_groups: Jurimetry, Legal Cybernetics and Data Science
Algorithms, Language Models and Intellectual Property

historical_context.achievements: Over 1,000 researchers participated across previous editions, nearly 700 scientific papers presented, 42 scientific books published
historical_context.reputation: Established as a reference in the international academic agenda in law and technology

pl_2338_23.description: Brazilian AI regulation bill approved by Senate in December 2024
key_features: Fines up to R$50,000,000 or 2% of annual revenue
Prohibition of certain high-risk AI applications
Human oversight requirements for automated decisions
pl_2338_23.relevance: Central topic for conference discussions on AI legal framework
